subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Denis Watson birdied the final hole to win the FedEx Kinko’s Classic, taking advantage of Nick Price’s back-nine errors in Lakeway, Tex. Watson, from Zimbabwe, closed with a three-under 69 to finish at 10 under. He earned $240,000 for his second victory of the year and fourth over all on the Champions Tour.
